title: CORALDECK
descrption: CORALDECK is an exfiltration tool used by APT37. [1]

references.title: FireEye. (2018, February 20). APT37 (Reaper): The Overlooked North Korean Actor. Retrieved March 1, 2018.

related.Name: Data Compressed
related.Use: CORALDECK has created password-protected RAR, WinImage, and zip archives to be exfiltrated.[1]

related.Name: Data Encrypted
related.Use: CORALDECK has created password-protected RAR, WinImage, and zip archives to be exfiltrated.[1]

related.Name: Standard Application Layer Protocol
related.Use: CORALDECK has exfiltrated data in HTTP POST headers.[1]
